name: Mushroom Soup - FPS Prototype
description:
Final project for GameDevTV - Complete C# Unity 3D Course

Lilly is cooking a delicious Mushroom Soup but she forgot the mushrooms. 

Use the correct weapons to defeat each enemy and retrieve the mushrooms.

Pink Weapon: Close range, fast fire rate

Blue Weapon: Long range, slow fire rate

Controls: 

Enter - Advance dialogues

WASD - Move the character

Shift - Run

1, 2 - Switch Weapons

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Zoom
